Update Regarding Annual Alarm System Registrations. To consolidate records and streamline services, Effective January 1, 2026, residents will no longer register their alarm systems through the City. Instead, all alarm registrations will now be completed directly through theÂ Memorial Villages Police Department (MVPD) website on an annual basis. That link will be on the Police website ( https://www.mvpdtx.org/ ) under Alarm System Registration on the homepage. The link will be active after January 1, 2026 Read More HERE

Property taxes for the City of Piney Point Village are incorporated with statements from Spring Branch Independent School District. Please click here to go to SBISD Tax Home Page to view and pay your city taxes or call 713-251-7960 for more information.

The City of Piney Point Village has been recognized as a Tree City for 14 years. The Tree City USA Growth Award is presented by the Arbor Day Foundation to participating Tree City USA communities that demonstrate higher levels of tree care and community engagement during the calendar year.
